long_description: SunCloud Pursuit wrap-around polarized sunglasses go with you on any adventure and protect your eyes from the sun's glare. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and a third the weight; they're also acid- and heat-resistant. Grilamid(R) lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature, and they are extremely impact resistant. Hydrophilic Megol(TM) nose pads become tacky when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. Tortoise frames feature polarized brown lenses to eliminate glare and enhance contrast while maintaining accuracy of color transmissions. Black frames feature polarized gray lenses to eliminate glare and produce the truest transmission of natural colors. Medium-large fit.
